sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	q = \frac{4ij }{i + j }
\]
Then find the value of the expression
\[
	\frac{q + 2i }{q - 2i } + \frac{q + 2j }{q - 2j }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	q = \frac{4ij }{i + j }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q }{2i } = \frac{2j }{i + j }
\]
Applying componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{q + 2i }{q - 2i } = \frac{2j + (i + j )}{2j - (i + j )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q + 2i }{q - 2i } = \frac{i + 3j }{j - i }
\]

Now, from the given expression, we can also write,
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q }{2j } = \frac{2i }{i + j }
\]
Now, by applying componendo and dividendo for this equation on both sides, we get
\[
	\frac{q + 2j }{q - 2j } = \frac{2i + (i + j )}{2i - (i + j )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{q + 2j }{q - 2j } = \frac{3i + j }{i - j }
\]
Now, by adding the above two expressions, we can get
\[
	\frac{q + 2i }{q - 2i } + \frac{q + 2j }{q - 2j } = \frac{i + 3j }{j - i } + \frac{3i + j }{i - j }
\]
\[
	= \frac{3i + j }{i - j } - \frac{i + 3j }{i - j } 
\]
\[
	= \frac{3i + j - i - 3j }{i - j }
\]
\[
	= \frac{2(i - j )}{i - j }
\]
\[
	= 2
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
